item.title: Pattern Matching in Scala
item.description: Not so long ago I gave a presentation about Scala and ScalaTest to my co-workers. This was just basics as I wanted to give them a good and solid base for future researching this language. As it turned out - I probably learned a lot more than they did from this :) Whenever there is Scala mentioned there also is the phrase pattern matching. Of course Scala does support pattern matching but I didn’t know how much fun one can have with this.
